newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Aros reiterates Merck buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Aros reiterates Merck buy.

text.p: Aros Securities said analyst David Maris had reiterated his buy rating on Merck & Co, citing an 8.5 percent decline in share price over the past month as a buying opportunity.
-- said shares continue to trade at a discount to the group of U.S. pharmaceuticals companies.

-- said concerns over Merck patent expirations are "a bit premature" and should be tempered by recognition that Merck's pipeline includes several potential blockbuster drugs, including 1998 launches of Propecia, Maxalt, Aggrastat and Singulair.
-- said forecasting continued near-term price volatility for the drug group as a result of "demanding" valuations, but added that industry fundamentals remain robust.
-- Merck was up 1-1/8 to 93-9/16 in morning trade.
